question: 小遣い
sourceMnemonic: If <ja>遣う</ja> is something along the lines of "to consider" then a "<kanji>small</kanji> consider" is what I'll give you for your <vocabulary>spending money</vocabulary>. Can I have some money? $50? No, how about a smaller consideration on that, maybe something that's more along the lines of an <vocabulary>allowance</vocabulary>?
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the alternate reading of <ja>小</ja> and <ja>遣う</ja>'s reading. Watch out for the rendaku.
